titleStmt.title: Christian curtesie: or, St. Pauls vltimum vale Deliuered in two sermons, on 2. Cor. 13.11. at St. Margarets on Fish-street-hill in London. By N. Rogers (sometimes preacher there) at his farewel, vpon his remoueal thence to a pastoral charge else-where.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Nehemiah, 1593-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Edward Brewster: and are to bee sould at his shop, at the west end of Pauls, at the signe of the Star,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the west end of Pauls, at the signe of the Star
